snippet: The announcement followed a round of sanctions imposed Wednesday by Washington against Russian companies and individuals, the third such measure this year.
abstract: Russia's Foreign Ministry announces that it is expanding its list of Americans barred from the country, another reflection of the poor state of relations between Washington and Moscow.
lead_paragraph: The announcement followed a round of sanctions imposed Wednesday by Washington against Russian companies and individuals, the third such measure this year.

headline.main: Russia Expands List of Barred Americans
headline.print_headline: Russia Expands List of Barred Americans
